DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare compact intermittent catheter standard coat intermittent catheter regard quality life , use Intermittent Self-Catheterisation Quality life Measure .
DOC.criteria: Is least 18 year age Has give write informed consent Has neurogenic bladder dysfunction Has use coat intermittent catheter primarily bladder empty method least 6 month Is able selfcatheterise Is able use SpeediCath® compact catheter If spinal cord injury subject , injury must occur 12 month ago Covered Social security system Has use SpeediCath® compact catheter ( include screen investigation ) Is admit rehabilitation centre Subjects use primarily catheter set Is pregnant breastfeed
